title: Splash and dash: How Piastri recreated Ricciardo's greatest race
summary: Oscar Piastri's masterful Spa-Francorchamps win was reminiscent of Daniel Ricciardo's finest F1 drive back in 2014, writesMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Which race is often considered Daniel Ricciardo's greatest drive?
What notable characteristic did Oscar Piastri's win at Spa-Francorchamps showcase?
In which year did Oscar Piastri win his first Formula 1 race?
